Articles.Content: Landed? Isn't this supposed to be impossible?
From that, we can conclude, JEB MAKES THE IMPOSSIBLE POSSIBLE.
Not with Jeb. He's the Chuck Norris of astronauts.

Yeah, that is strange I've only been able to spazz out and never return.

Jeb was made by Nokia and named him Chuck Norris until KSP took him.

Yes, it seems you've found out that the planets themselves gives way to Jeb.

It doesn't matter if it's a gas giant, jeb's gonna land there if he wants to.

Is there where i gloat/brag that I did it completely 100% stock, and have never used mods ever?

Edited September 30, 2012 by -Gamah
wrong vowel
all hail jeb, destroyer of physics!

Is there where i gloat/brag that I did it completely 100% stock, and have never used mods ever?

Well, welcome to the club, i don't use any myself either.

Did the landing take you many tries?

Well, welcome to the club, i don't use any myself either.

Did the landing take you many tries?

Not to sound pompous, but I have never used the quicksave/load feature ever, either.

Launch to land, 1 try.
Not to be a jerk, but I'm gonna call shenanigans. Nobody is that good. You want to make that claim you need to record it

Not to be a jerk, but I'm gonna call shenanigans. Nobody is that good. You want to make that claim you need to record it

I will stream it later, I don't know if the kerbin gods will allow me to complete a stationary landing, but I will touchdown at negative 98 meters at a velocity less than 3m/s
Better to record it (eg Youtube) otherwise we have to be available at the same time you want to do it.
I landed on Jool but when I went EVA everything bounced around and then this

Better to record it (eg Youtube) otherwise we have to be available at the same time you want to do it.

All of my good stream sessions end up on youtube. Starting this mission now.

http://www.twitch.tv/Gamah1991
Finally got my encounter on the map, going for the landing in about 2 years game time, or about 10 minutes?

about to land

Uploaded to youtube and processing.

Might as well skip the first 19 minutes as I picked the wrong ship for my patience level and ran out of fuel, forcing a re launch with a more fuel efficient ship.

Edited September 30, 2012 by -Gamah

Your ship is ridiculously overpowered, your ascent and escape from Kerbin were horribly inefficient, you burned up way too much delta-v getting a shoddy intercept years away, using not even the most basic of navigation aides or orbital calculations, running your nukes to over 90% overheat in the process, to finally put a lander on Jool's glitchy surface in some completely random spot. And you dumped almost an hour and a half of unedited stream on YouTube. All because shenanigans were called on you?

You, sir, are badass

Great job!

From that, we can conclude, JEB MAKES THE IMPOSSIBLE POSSIBLE.

Jeb = The KSP universe's Wedge Antillies?

Your ship is ridiculously overpowered, your ascent and escape from Kerbin were horribly inefficient, you burned up way too much delta-v getting a shoddy intercept years away, using not even the most basic of navigation aides or orbital calculations, running your nukes to over 90% overheat in the process, to finally put a lander on Jool's glitchy surface in some completely random spot. And you dumped almost an hour and a half of unedited stream on YouTube. All because shenanigans were called on you?

You, sir, are badass

Great job!

Isn't this how everyone plays? lol. Certainly works for me, as anybody who's ever watched my streams can attest.

Your ship is ridiculously overpowered, your ascent and escape from Kerbin were horribly inefficient, you burned up way too much delta-v getting a shoddy intercept years away, using not even the most basic of navigation aides or orbital calculations, running your nukes to over 90% overheat in the process, to finally put a lander on Jool's glitchy surface in some completely random spot. And you dumped almost an hour and a half of unedited stream on YouTube. All because shenanigans were called on you?

You, sir, are badass

Great job!

You forgot the part where I didn't use the quickload/save feature... that was why I didn't shorten the stream on youtube.

:3

I wouldn't say I can do something if I couldn't back it up...

I realize that I have little to no idea how to properly/efficiently fly these missions, so I use my engineering/construction strengths to make my ships completely idiot proof.
I'll make the video, get back to you sometime today or tomorrow... It ain't that hard...

I'll make the video, get back to you sometime today or tomorrow... It ain't that hard...

That's exactly my point, did you listen to the first 45 seconds of the video?
